name: Like Nastya Smoothies Maker
description: Welcome to our Like Nastya game, the empire of smoothies, where you can make the best smoothies! Once your smoothies are cooked, use our decorating tips that can turn smoothies into tasty and delicious desserts! Do the same with a cup of smoothies - decorate them with different straws and stickers. Make smoothies appealing. Isn't this one of the best dessert games ever or what ?!
